title: E-Textile Gesture Sleeve
summary: A knitted sleeve with conductive pathways that tracks forearm flexion for silent gesture input.
context: Course studio exploring textile interfaces for accessibility and hands-free control.
process: Pattern design, conductive yarn routing, microcontroller prototyping, and firmware mapping.
outcome: Reliable gesture recognition in low-light runway tests; documented BOM and stitch map.

title: Smart Drape Lighting
summary: Soft woven panel with embedded LED filaments for ambient architectural glow.
context: Material research to merge interior light with fabric tactility.
process: Wiring patterns, diffusion tests, thermal safety pass.
outcome: Modular panel system with magnetic connectors.
